summary: After his own gang sets him up to kill a rival mobster, a hit man is forced to flee with his younger brother.
cast: Hideki Takahashi|Masako Izumi|Hiroko Itô|Kayo Matsuo|Hôsei Komatsu|Seizaburô Kawazu|Kaku Takashina|Kotobuki Hananomoto|Akira Yamauchi|Yuji Kodaka|Hiroshi Chiyoda|Yôko Yokota|Tessen Nakahira|Zenpei Saga|Michio Hino|Hiroshi Kôno|Hiroshi Chô|Wataru Kobayashi|Shirô Tonami|Hiroshi Takao|Keisuke Noro|Shirô Yanase|Masaaki Honme|Akira Takahashi|Akira Hisamatsu|Ryû Ikezawa|Yoshihiro Yamaguchi|Eiko Takada|Midori Mori|Yôko Naka|Akira Yamanouchi|Motoshi Hana|Yûji Odaka|Tadashi Takashina|Iwae Arai|Hiroshi Midorikawa|Yoshigi Ôba
title: Irezumi ichidai
